actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to extend for 1 year authorities for special project grants for maternal and child health, for social work training programs, and for temporary assistance to U.S. citizens returned from foreign countries.

summary.text: Extends for one year, under the Social Security Act, the authorization for (1) special project grants for maternal and child health, (2) social work training programs, and (3) temporary assistance to United States citizens returned from foreign countries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to extend for 1 year authorities for special project grants for maternal and child health, for social work training programs, and for temporary assistance to U.S. citizens returned from foreign countries.
